articles.title: Patriots might just have something going after doing exactly what needed to be done against a have-not opponent
articles.description:
Yes, the Panthers are a lousy football team, but it’s been a long time since the Patriots breezed to a win. This was catharsis, and maybe real progress, too.

The post Patriots might just have something going after doing exactly what needed to be done against a have-not opponent appeared first on Boston.com.
